articles.description: Liverpool's "heavy metal" approach under Jurgen Klopp may be a thing of the past - but Arne Slot passed his first big test against Chelsea.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-1 Chelsea: Arne Slot's measured approach leads Liverpool surge to top

articles.description: Lando Norris is penalised for passing Max Verstappen as Charles Leclerc wins the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Lando Norris loses third to Max Verstappen as Charles Leclerc wins

articles.description: Suzie Bates and Sophie Devine finally get their crowning moment after almost two decades in the international game.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Suzie Bates and Sophie Devine's long-awaited crowning moment amid New Zealand history

articles.description: Former Liverpool midfielder and MOTD pundit Danny Murphy explains why Curtis Jones has had the perfect week.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-1 Chelsea: 'The performance we've been waiting for' - how Curtis Jones capped his perfect week

articles.description: Robert Lewandowski continues his red-hot form with two goals as Barcelona thrash Sevilla to restore their three-point lead at the top of La Liga.
articles.title: Barcelona 5-1 Sevilla: Robert Lewandowski scores twice for La Liga leaders

articles.description: What was the fall-out of John Stones' late winner for Manchester City against Wolves, with the goal given following a VAR check after initially being ruled out.
articles.title: Wolves v Man City: Winning goal a 'grey area' - but what does law say?

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Barcelona and Norway winger Caroline Graham Hansen, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Caroline Graham Hansen

articles.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars come from behind to ease the pressure on under-fire coach Doug Pederson with a 32-16 win over the New England Patriots in London.
articles.title: NFL London: Jacksonville Jaguars fight back to beat New England Patriots 32-16 at Wembley

articles.description: Will Young and Rachin Ravindra guide New Zealand to an eight-wicket victory in Bengaluru - their first Test win in India since 1988.
articles.title: India vs New Zealand: Tourists claim first Test win in country for 36 years

articles.description: Sir Chris Hoy has received well-wishes after revealing his cancer diagnosis is terminal.
articles.title: Sir Chris Hoy courage praised as he reveals terminal cancer
